history.proof: intros x y H. apply rel_prime_sym in H. apply rel_prime_div with (r := Z.opp x) in H. apply rel_prime_mult with (c := -1) in H. apply rel_prime_sym in H. pose Z.divide_opp_l; auto. pose Z.divide_refl; auto. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve.

ctx: apply rel_prime_div with (r := Z.opp x) in H.
exceptions.exn: In environment x, y : Z H : rel_prime (x * -1) (- x) Unable to unify "rel_prime (x * -1) (- x)" with "rel_prime (- x) (- y)".

ctx: apply rel_prime_div with (r := Z.opp x) in H.
exceptions.exn: In environment x, y : Z H : rel_prime (x * -1) (- x) Unable to unify "((- ?M1853 | ?M1854) -> (?M1853 | ?M1854)) /\\ ((?M1853 | ?M1854) -> (- ?M1853 | ?M1854))" with "Zis_gcd (- x) (- y) 1".

ctx: apply rel_prime_div with (r := Z.opp x) in H.
exceptions.exn: In environment x, y : Z H : rel_prime (x * -1) (- x) i := Z.divide_opp_l : forall n m : Z, (- n | m) <-> (n | m) Unable to unify "exists z : Z, ?M1857 = z * ?M1857" with "Zis_gcd (- x) (- y) 1".

apply Z.divide_opp_l.
apply Z.divide_refl.
